title: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex filmed a documentary in Africa - and it features baby Archie!
text:
The Duke and Duchess of Sussex filmed a documentary in Africa - and it features baby Archie!

Cape Town - The Duke and Duchess are reportedly set to release a documentary of their 10-day tour in Africa.

British journalist Tom Bradby took to his Twitter page to reveal the exciting news to his fans, Hello! Magazine reported.

"Just finished filming a documentary on Harry and Meghan in Africa. I think it will explain a lot when it airs," he wrote in the tweet.





The upcoming documentary is set to go behind the scenes of the couples’ engagements from South Africa to Malawi, Botswana and Angola, according to the Independent.

Four-month-old Archie who stole the show when he made his official appearance on the third day of the tour, is also set to star in the doccie.

This isn’t the first documentary Tom has worked on together with the royals.

In 2016 he filmed a documentary with Prince Harry following his tour of Africa and interviewed the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge in 2017 after their engagement announcement, The Sun reports.

(Sources: Hello! Magazine, Independent, The Sun, Twitter)
description: The Duke and Duchess are reportedly set to release a documentary of their ten-day tour of Africa.
